Target
module automatic Target

TCP/IP SystemVerilog SHUNT Target module for SystemVerilog-to-SystemVerilog communication

This module serves as the client in a client-server communication model between two SystemVerilog domains. It connects to the Initiator and processes a comprehensive suite of loopback tests for all SystemVerilog data types.

The module receives data from the Initiator, then sends it back to verify bidirectional communication over TCP/IP.

Variables
String
string String

String variable used for string data type tests

Socket
int Socket

Stores the socket descriptor for TCP/IP communication

h_trnx
cs_header_t h_trnx

Communication protocol header for transaction data

h_data
cs_data_header_t h_data

Communication protocol header for data payload

Only defined when NO_CS_DATA_HEADER_T is not defined

Result
int Result

Stores return values from function calls to check for success

clk_cnt
int clk_cnt

Clock cycle counter

mem_data
logic [31:0] mem_data

Memory data input

mem_byte_enable
logic [31:0] mem_byte_enable

Memory byte enable signals

logic [31:0] mem_addr

Memory address for read/write operations

mem_we
logic mem_we

Memory write enable signal

logic [31:0] mem_q

Memory data output

bit end_sim

Flag to indicate end of simulation

bit start_sim

Flag to indicate start of simulation

bit trnx_in_progress

Flag to indicate a transaction is in progress

int clk_next

Clock cycle for next operation

int sockid

TCP/IP socket identifier

cs_tlm_generic_payload_header_t h

TLM generic payload header

cs_tlm_axi3_extension_payload_header_t h_ext

TLM AXI3 extension payload header for incoming data

cs_tlm_axi3_extension_payload_header_t h_ext_out

TLM AXI3 extension payload header for outgoing data

Returns
